name: .NET Global Tools
description: Install custom .NET global tools from the official .NET tool ecosystem

tools.description: Comma-separated list of .NET global tools to install. Format: 'tool@version' or 'tool@latest'. Examples: 'dotnet-format@latest,dotnet-ef@8.0.0,dotnet-outdated-tool@latest'

prerelease.description: Include prerelease versions when installing tools
